General.Name: Nordic Shipholding A/S
General.Description: Nordic Shipholding A/S operates as a ship owning company in Denmark. The company was formerly known as Nordic Tankers A/S and changed its name to Nordic Shipholding A/S in 2012. Nordic Shipholding A/S was founded in 1984 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark. Nordic Shipholding A/S is a subsidiary of Nordic Maritime S.à r.l.
